pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 或 AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 或 AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 兼容 DirectX 的声卡
